other_tests.findings: Inflammation, wall thickening, and inflammatory fat stranding at the proximal-to-mid sigmoid colon consistent with perforation. Extraluminal air is consistent with perforation. Mild dependent atelectatic changes noted in lung bases. A calcified granuloma observed in the left lower lobe. The left kidney contains a hypodensity most likely a simple cyst.
Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay.
